title: Feedback
description: Think something could be better? Tell us! Submit any thoughts/bugs/ideas to “Feedback”

title: SMS Notification
description: Get notified when you’re almost through the queue! Find “Account Settings” < Enable SMS Notifications < Save

title: Changelog
description: Take a look at new features and changes to the site! Find “Changelogs”

title: FAQ
description: Have questions? Look through our “FAQ” tab on the sidebar!

title: [Instructor] View Past Questions
description: Go to Question Summary to view past questions.
